item.title: Good Coder Needed -- What's Wrong With The Codes?
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

Alright, i have these booleans, ints, timers, etc

public boolean IronHpOn = true;
public boolean stopmessage = true;
public int Ironingame = 0;
public int Ironwaittimer = 0

now under boolean process i have this

if(Ironwaittimer == 0 && IronHpWait())
{
teleportToX = 3240; //ihpgame
teleportToY = 3944; //ihpgame
Ironwaittimer = 40;
Ironingame = 20;
}
if(IronHpOn == true && stopmessage == false) {
Ironwaittimer = 20;
timestop = false;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "'The Iron Hitpoint' Has Started";
stopmessage = true;
}
if(Ironingame == 0 && IronHpGame())
{
teleportToX = 3231;
teleportToY = 2922;
sendMessage("You Failed To Kill The Oponents");
}
if(IronHpOn == false && stopmessage == false ) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "'The Iron Hitpoint' Has Been Closed!";
stopmessage = true;
}

I have this command for ::ihp

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ihp") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Le Hawtz") && IronHpOn == false) {
					IronHpOn = true;
					stopmessage = false;
				} else if (IronHpOn == true) {
					IronHpOn = false;
					stopmessage = false;
					}

and i have these booleans as well


public boolean IronHpGame() {
if (absX >= 3218 && absY >= 3937 && absX <= 3257 && absY <= 3955)
return true;
else
return false;
}
public boolean IronHpWait() {
if (absX >= 3231 && absY >= 3922 && absX <= 3235 && absY <= 3925)
return true;
else
return false;
}

But for some reason, when i type ::ihp and it comes on, it NEVER teles me into the arena, ive waited 40 minutes, and nothing
many thanks
~ Le Hawtz
P.S. I will give you 40% credits when i release this if you help me figure it out, and dont you dare take these booleans and ints as your own, or you will be reported to the un-named
~ Le Hawtz

Read full topic
item.source: Good Coder Needed -- What's Wrong With The Codes?
